Self: 3 turns Fortissimo

Concerto use +1

When using Concerto:
 â€¢ Slight boost to BRV granted based on MAX BRV

While Note active:

passives.name: Dissonant Sonata Extension
passives.desc:
Dissonant Sonata use +2

When using Dissonant Sonata:
 â€¢  PG attack hit count becomes 5; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 â€¢ Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 â€¢ Triggers additional  PF attack on target after use

While Crescendo active:
BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ ( PG attack hit count becomes 2; slightly increased cumulative BRV damage; grants party BRV based on own MAX BRV; BRV damage boosted based on party's Note total)
